## Introduction

TV 3L PC is a free internet TV software that allows users to watch their favorite TV channels for free. With access to over 1,000 channels from different countries and languages, this software is perfect for those looking to cut the cord and stream TV online. In this article, we will discuss its features and how to use it.

## Features

### Channel List

TV 3L PC offers users access to over 1,000 channels from different countries and languages. The channels are arranged in categories such as news, sports, music, and movies for easy navigation. Users can add their favorite channels to a personal list for quick access.

### Recording

The software comes with a recording feature that allows users to record their favorite TV shows and movies for later viewing. The recorded content can be saved to the user's computer for offline watching.

### Multilingual

TV 3L PC is a multilingual software that supports different languages, making it accessible to users from all over the world.

### User-friendly Interface

The software has a clean and user-friendly interface that makes navigating through the channels easy. The interface is customizable, allowing users to change the skin or layout to their preferences.

### Low System Requirements

TV 3L PC has low system requirements, making it accessible to users with low-end computers or laptops.

## How to Use

### Download and Install

To use TV 3L PC, simply download the software from its official website and install it on your computer.

### Channel Selection

After installation, launch the software and select your preferred channel from the list. You can also search for a channel using the search bar.

### Recording

To use the recording feature, simply click on the "Record" button while watching your preferred TV show or movie. The recorded content will be saved to your computer for later viewing.

### Customization

To customize the interface, click on the "Settings" button and select your preferred skin or layout.

## Conclusion

TV 3L PC is a free and user-friendly internet TV software that offers access to over 1,000 channels from different countries and languages. Its recording feature and customizable interface make it a popular choice for those looking to stream TV online. If you're looking for a free internet TV software, give TV 3L PC a try.
